title: Installing Linux
snippet: So searching for a new laptop took me about two weeks… I ended up getting a Thinkpad x1 gen 7.Okay. I thought I was ready to try Linux but I hadn’t decided what distro I was going to install. To be honest, I kind of knew there were different versions of Linux but didn’t know there were so many. title: Welcome!
snippet: Hello!Hi, this is Joon and I will be writing about some of the things that I do whilestudying at the University of Minnesota - Twin Cities. I will be starting myfirst year of Master’s program in computer science.I hope you enjoy your time here!Thanks for visiting,Joon
